item.title: Deena add a quote by Chuck Klosterman
item.description:
"I'm shocked by anyone who doesn't consider Los Angeles to be anything less than a bozo-saturated hellhole. It is pretty much without question the worst city in America. The reason "Walking in L.A." by Missing Persons was the most accidentally prescient single of 1982 was because of its unfathomable (but wholly accurate) specificity: Los Angeles is the only city in the world where the process of walking on the sidewalk could somehow be a) political and b) humiliating. It is the only community I've ever visited where absolutely everything cliche proved to be completely accurate.
I don't care if 85% of Los Angeles is stupid. I can deal with stupid. My problem is that every stupid person in Los Angeles is also a) unyieldingly narcissistic and b) unyieldingly nice. They have somehow managed to combine raging megalomania with genuine friendliness." -- Chuck Klosterman

item.title: Deena add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Deena add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Deena add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Deena add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Deena add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Deena add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Deena add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Deena add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Deena add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Deena add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "A wise girl kisses but doesn't love, listens but doesn't believe, and leaves before she is left." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Deena add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "I'm not upset that you lied to me, I'm upset that from now on I can't believe you." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Deena add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Deena add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "When it comes down to it, I let them think what they want. If they care enough to bother with what I do, then I'm already better than them." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Deena add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "I've been making a list of the things they don't teach you at school. They don't teach you how to love somebody. They don't teach you how to be famous. They don't teach you how to be rich or how to be poor. They don't teach you how to walk away from someone you don't love any longer. They don't teach you how to know what's going on in someone else's mind. They don't teach you what to say to someone who's dying. They don't teach you anything worth knowing." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Deena add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "You're going to come across people in your life who will say all the right words at all the right times. But in the end, it's always their actions you should judge them by. It's actions, not words, that matter." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Deena add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "And above all, watch with glittering eyes the whole world around you because the greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places. Those who don't believe in magic will never find it." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Deena add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Substitute 'damn' every time you're inclined to write 'very;' your editor will delete it and the writing will be just as it should be." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Deena add a quote by Bette Midler
item.description: "Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world." -- Bette Midler

item.title: Deena add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Fate is like a strange, unpopular restaurant filled with odd little waiters who bring you things you never asked for and don't always like." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Deena add a quote by Phyllis Diller
item.description: "Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight." -- Phyllis Diller

item.title: Deena add a quote by Kent M. Keith
item.description:
"The Paradoxical Commandments
People are illogical, unreasonable, and self-centered. Love them anyway.
If you do good, people will accuse you of selfish ulterior motives. Do good anyway.
If you are successful, you will win false friends and true enemies. Succeed anyway.
The good you do today will be forgotten tomorrow. Do good anyway.
Honesty and frankness make you vulnerable. Be honest and frank anyway.
The biggest men and women with the biggest ideas can be shot down by the smallest men and women with the smallest minds. Think big anyway.
People favor underdogs but follow only top dogs. Fight for a few underdogs anyway.
What you spend years building may be destroyed overnight. Build anyway.
People really need help but may attack you if you do help them. Help people anyway.
Give the world the best you have and you'll get kicked in the teeth. Give the world the best you have anyway." -- Kent M. Keith

item.title: Deena add a quote by William Blake
item.description: "It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend." -- William Blake

item.title: Deena add a quote by Andrew Matthews
item.description: "Is it easy? Usually not. But you don't forgive people for their benefit. You do it for your benefit." -- Andrew Matthews

item.title: Deena add a quote by Emma Goldman
item.description: "Before we can forgive one another, we have to understand one another." -- Emma Goldman

item.title: Deena add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "When you're in jail, a good friend will be trying to bail you out. A best friend will be in the cell next to you saying, 'Damn, that was fun'." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Deena add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "She was a girl who knew how to be happy even when she was sad. And that’s important—you know " -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Deena add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "But better to get hurt by the truth than comforted with a lie." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Deena add a quote by Horace Mann
item.description: "A house without books is like a room without windows." -- Horace Mann

item.title: Deena add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "It takes a minute to have a crush on someone, an hour to like someone, and a day to love someone... but it takes a lifetime to forget someone." -- Kahlil Gibran
